price: Nein! Vielmehr ist Allah euer Schutzherr; und Er ist der beste Helfer.
arabic: بَلِ ٱللَّهُ مَوۡلَىٰكُمۡۖ وَهُوَ خَيۡرُ ٱلنَّٰصِرِينَ

version.title: German Translation - Bubenheim
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into German by Abdullah As-Samit (Frank Bubenheim) and Dr. Nadeem Elyas

meta.transliteration: bali al-lahu mawlākum wahuwa khayru al-nāṣirīna
